name: Cat Tribe (Children's Game)
description:
A childrens game about feeding your Tribe of cats with various food items.

Find out what your Tribe wants and find the correct items from the island and bring them back to your Tribe!

(Mini Jam 80: Cats) 

Theme: Cats

Limitation: 8x8

Every character sprite, background, object, entity and tileset is 8 by 8 pixels.

Controls:

Space / F - interact

WASD / Arrows - Move

ESC - Quit to Desktop (in title screen)

Gamepad:

A - Interact

L-Stick / Dpad - Move

Select- Quit to Desktop (in title screen)
